overview:
Ron Burr is an entrepreneur, holder of 6 internet patents, and the co-founder and original chief executive officer of NetZero, currently the worlds 3rd largest Internet Service Provider.

In 2009, Burr became Chief Operations Officer for WebVisible, a Software as a Service (SaaS) company and leading name in local online advertising. WebVisible is a highly awarded company and was recently named an INC 500 fastest growing company. Webvisible is recognized for being a true expert in bringing the Internet as an advertising and customer acquisition medium to small businesses around the world. In 2010, Burr became the Chief Executive Officer for WebVisible, and he currently hold this position, leading WebVisible.

During his career he has created technology solutions for many of America’s top companies, including IBM, Verizon Wireless, and Sempra Energy. Burr is a frequent guest speaker at industry conferences and was named by InfoWorld as one of the Top 50 IT executives at xSPâ€™s, by Interactive Week as one of the 25 Top Unsung Hero’s of the Net and was a finalist for Ernst & Young’s Entrepreneur of the Year award.
